name: Galaxus
description:
A "mobile-split-screen" shooter. Played on a single device by two people.

Each player grabs one end of the phone and uses the buttons on their side of the screen to control their ship.

Left Arrow - Moves Left
Right Arrow - Moves Right
Crosshairs - Fires

Each player gets three lives, tap the screen to reload.

Thanks to everyone for playing, I hope you enjoy.
